[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 0003 - Statement - Vykaz peneznich toku but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalents, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInWorkingCapital, buduz:AdjustmentsForNocashItems, buduz:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeTax, buduz:CashAndCashEquivalentsInvestmentActivities, ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.0 -
